time_zone: # The data below is specified in terms of hours since local midnight in the time zone specified in column 1
# The market and security type columns are required
symbol: searching will be done first with symbol and then without the symbol as a fall back

time_zone: # Time zones can be specified using a Tzdb name
market: or by specifying an offset from UTC using the form: 'UTC{+/-}{offset in hours}'

time_zone: # Specify - for ex_open to signify the exchange is closed all day
# Specify + for ex_open to signify the exchange is open all day
# Specify 0 for midnight in local time and 24 for the end of day
